titleStmt.title: An account of several travels through a great part of Germany in four journeys ... : illustrated with sculptures / by Edward Brown ...
titleStmt.author: Brown, Edward, 1644-1708.

biblFull.extent: [4], 179 p., [3] folded leaves of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
(from t.p.) I. From Norwich to Colen -- II. From Colen to Vienna, with a particular description of that imperial city -- III. From Vienna to Hamburg -- IV. From Colen to London.
